00024 #ifndef __OPENNSL_RMAPI_H__
00025 #define __OPENNSL_RMAPI_H__
00026 #include <opennsl/types.h>
00027 #include <sal/commdefs.h>
00028 
00029 #define RM_MAX_UNITS         1
00030 #define RM_MAX_CLIENTS       3
00031 
00032 #define RM_MIN_CLIENT_ID     1
00033 #define RM_MAX_CLIENT_ID     (RM_MAX_CLIENTS - 1)
00034 
00036 typedef enum opennsl_rm_retval_e {
00037   OPENNSL_RM_E_NONE                   =  0,  
00038   OPENNSL_RM_E_INVALID_INPUT          = -1,  
00039   OPENNSL_RM_E_INVALID_CLNT_ID        = -2,  
00040   OPENNSL_RM_E_INVALID_L2_ENTRY_LIMIT = -3,  
00041   OPENNSL_RM_E_MEMALLOC_FAIL          = -4,  
00042   OPENNSL_RM_E_CLNT_LIMIT_EXCEEDED    = -5,  
00043   OPENNSL_RM_E_PHYPORT_CONFLICT       = -6,  
00044   OPENNSL_RM_E_VLAN_CONFLICT          = -7,  
00045   OPENNSL_RM_E_UNREGISTERED_CLNT_ID   = -8,  
00046   OPENNSL_RM_E_L2TABLE_LIMIT_EXCEEDED = -9,  
00047   OPENNSL_RM_E_INTERNAL               = -10, 
00048   OPENNSL_RM_E_LIMIT                  = -11, 
00049 } opennsl_rm_retval_t;
00050 /* __doxy_func_body_end__ */
00051 
00053 typedef struct opennsl_rm_profile_s
00054 {
00055   opennsl_pbmp_t port_bitmap[RM_MAX_UNITS];  
00056   opennsl_vlan_vector_t vlan_bitmap;         
00057   uint32 l2_table_limit;                     
00058 } opennsl_rm_profile_t;
